Class SettingsManager

java.lang.Object
chessgui.SettingsManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SettingsManager extends Object implements Serializable
Manages user preferences for board colors, styles, and sizes. Fully supports multiple color themes, piece styles, and board sizes. Supports both preset and fully custom light/dark color overrides.
See Also:
